title: Lag spikes

replies.body:
That is maybe your PC, then. 
Maybe sometimes your ram is full or your CPU is, maybe you have to buy a better GPU or maybe search it up on Google. Maybe your PC has some viruses or you should watch some YouTube videos about have a better FPS...

replies.body: I use OptiFine and Razer Gamebooster, do you recommend I add more Ram to Minecraft?
replies.body_tagged: I use OptiFine and Razer Gamebooster, do you recommend I add more Ram to Minecraft?

replies.body: Yes, but it will change only like 5-10 fps, nothing very "good" though.

replies.body: I have big probs with  fps I have and average of 30 but it helped when i minnermized my screen I went up to 45.you should try it it might help u out
replies.body_tagged: I have big probs with  fps I have and average of 30 but it helped when i minnermized my screen I went up to 45.you should try it it might help u out

replies.body: Adding more ram to mine ready can increase your fps by more than 15. It just depends how much more you add....  e.g   when I played with 1 gig, my min fps was about 50 and max was around 200. After allocating mc 4 gigs,  I now get at least 80 fps, and a max of 330
replies.body_tagged: Adding more ram to mine ready can increase your fps by more than 15. It just depends how much more you add....  e.g   when I played with 1 gig, my min fps was about 50 and max was around 200. After allocating mc 4 gigs,  I now get at least 80 fps, and a max of 330

replies.body: I have 4 GB Ram (2.67GB Usable).. whatever that means
replies.body_tagged: I have 4 GB Ram (2.67GB Usable).. whatever that means

replies.body: If you're using too much RAM then your PC and MC will lag. I built a PC and have a good amount of RAM, but still only use 1G and everything works fine and I suggest using 1G. Uninstalling and reinstalling seems to help with almost anything xD, so try it. Also, you may not realize it, but your brother's laptop may have a bunch of junk files. Try installing YAC, it's a junk cleaner, system and boot-up optimizer, add-blocker (enable in settings), internet usage monitor, etc and a free trial of anti malware. Avast is a good anti-virus program that's free as well. I'm just trying to address all issues that may come up :P.
replies.body_tagged: If you're using too much RAM then your PC and MC will lag. I built a PC and have a good amount of RAM, but still only use 1G and everything works fine and I suggest using 1G. Uninstalling and reinstalling seems to help with almost anything xD, so try it. Also, you may not realize it, but your brother's laptop may have a bunch of junk files. Try installing YAC, it's a junk cleaner, system and boot-up optimizer, add-blocker (enable in settings), internet usage monitor, etc and a free trial of anti malware. Avast is a good anti-virus program that's free as well. I'm just trying to address all issues that may come up :P.

replies.body: well you seem to be making a lot of help posts recently, so I try XD. Lol, you need to set up a Skype account so we can talk sometime and also help you keep in touch with other people. My Skype is in the about section of my profile (the side tab was being stupid .-. and I never bothered to set it up after). Talk about PvP and issues and stuff :P. 1v1s as well. If you ever look to get equipment for your computor or look to improve your PC/whatever, I can help a bit.
